sitedata.metadesc: Trusted By Fine Real Estate Professionals

about.abouttext2: We are a subscription service giving you access to a database of aerial drone videos of communities in your area! 30+ and counting aerial community videos at your finger tips. If you were to pay for these videos individually, you would need to come up with 30 * $300 = $9000. We are going to give you all that for $50 a month or one small annual fee. You can create as many landing pages as you like, allowing you to customize them to each and every client, while simultaneously boosting your SEO. Leaving a very personal touch! Visit FlyMyCommunity.com today to sign up!
